summary: Cautionary tale features a fictionalized take on the use of marijuana. A trio of drug dealers lead innocent teenagers to become addicted to "reefer" cigarettes by holding wild parties with jazz music.
cast: Dorothy Short|Kenneth Craig|Lillian Miles|Dave O'Brien|Thelma White|Carleton Young|Warren McCollum|Patricia Royale|Joseph Forte|Harry Harvey Jr.|Richard Alexander|James Ard|Bob Burns|Lester Dorr|Phil Dunham|Edward Earle|Frank LaRue|Edward LeSaint|Mary MacLaren|Walter McGrail|Edmund Mortimer|Frank O'Connor|William Royle|Marin Sais|Forrest Taylor|Dan Wolheim|Ted Wray
director: Director: Louis J. Gasnier (as Louis Gasnier)
title: Tell Your Children
